subject: OutOfMemoryError
msgSnippet: Hi , I tried to subscribe to this newsgroup but did not received subscription mail from the group. Looking for a help from you guys. I am getting out of
messageBody:
Hi ,

I tried to subscribe to this newsgroup but did not received subscription mail from the group. Looking for a help from you guys.

I am getting out of OutOfMemoryError when I execute my JUnit test cases as generated by JTest.
I tried to set the memory arguments (-Xms512m -Xmx512m ) but it still gives me the same error.

Can anyone please help me out in this regard ?

Thanks in advance,
Yogesh
